titles.title: In The Heat Of The Battle

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the heat of the battle, when you're tired and worn.
Seems like you've been defeated; wounded, battered and torn.
In the midst of confusion; in the midst of despair.
When all hope you are losing, remember God is there.
The Lord is always there!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's always there, He's always there to uphold you.
To heal the pain, bring hope again, to your soul.
Lord of Lords, King of Kings. He'll bear you up on eagles' wings.
He's always there, He's always there, you know.
So in the heat of the battle, don't let go!
